Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 29th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2009...
Injured on 6/21/2010 with a Fractured Hand, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 9/9/2011 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Kansas City to Washington on 2/12/2012 (Going to WSH: 2B D. Gordon, LF D. Muñoz, C J. Jefferies, C S. Valentino, CF F. Pie. Going to KCA: C J. Mauer)...
Traded from Washington to Minnesota on 2/23/2013 (Going to MIN: P J. Hellickson, P A. Alcazar, LF J. Martinez, LF D. Muñoz, C D. Norris. Going to WSH: P S. Marshall, SS R. Rohlinger)...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2013, off Brandon Lyon (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2013, off Lance Lynn (CLE)...
Traded from Minnesota to San Francisco on 2/4/2014 (Going to SF: LF D. Muñoz, C M. Perez. Going to MIN: 2B J. Giavotella)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 7/22/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/23/2018, hitting .550 with 0 HR, 10 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/7/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
Injured on 5/31/2022 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 5/3/2023...
